General.Name: Viceroy Hotels Limited
General.Description: Viceroy Hotels Limited engages in the hoteliering business in India. The company owns and operates a convention center and 297 rooms with fine dining restaurants under the Marriott brand name; 120 Rooms with banquet halls and fine dining restaurant under the Courtyard Marriott brand; and 56 rooms budget hotel under the Minerva brand name. It also operates fine dining bar and restaurants under the Bluefox brand at Himayat Nagar, Ameerpet, and Madhapur in Hyderabad and Vijayawada; fine dining vegetarian restaurants under the Minerva Coffee Shop brand name at Himayat Nagar, Ameerpet, and Madhapur in Hyderabad and Vijayawada; and Eat Street, a food court with Minerva Coffee Shop and other kiosks, as well as Waterfront, a fine dine restaurant. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: Plot No. 20, HUDA Techno Enclave, Hyderabad, India, 500081
